metadata.title: Sample Cyber Attribution Framework Study
rq_lines: 0: What is the evidence that advanced cyber attribution frameworks rely on technical indicators for source attribution?
1: Which governance practices improve reliability of cyber attribution decisions?
2: How do attribution confidence levels vary across different evidence types?
